summary: Test suite for the off‑target detection component, providing helper utilities and a collection of unit tests that verify the behavior of the OffTargetDetector, its handling of BWA mapping results, filtering of primer pairs based on hit counts, generic filter logic, and conversion of mappings to amplicons.
business_intent: Validate the correctness of the off‑target analysis in a PCR primer design workflow, ensuring that primers with excessive or undesirable genome matches are identified and filtered out to improve assay specificity.
